resources.string: Aria2Android needs to write the external storage to save your downloaded files.
Failed creating an empty session file!
You denied the write permission! Can\'t start aria2!
Can\'t delete the bin file! Please clear application data.
Are you sure you want to change the bin version?

Aria2App will not provide the same functionalities of this app, but all-in-one. You are encouraged to migrate to Aria2App only if you were using the service on this device only. This app will be kept updated and working as usual.
